text: The code quality platform for teams Get Your Code in Check With Qodana On-Prem Lite, Our Newest, Easy-to-Deploy Solution You’ve probably heard of Qodana Self-Hosted, but now we’re bringing you a different kind of Self-Hosted Qodana that’s on-premises, Qodana On-Prem Lite, making powerful code quality analysis more accessible than ever. Designed for teams seeking a streamlined, resource-efficient solution, this new offering brings the benefits of Qodana to a more on-premises environment with a focus on ease of use and rapid deployment. And we’ve also made it simple to install with our new Qodana Installer CLI. Table of ContentsWhat is Qodana On-Prem Lite?Using the Qodana Installer CLIWhy opt for this self-hosted on-prem version of Qodana?Who is it for?Getting started: the requirementsWe’re here to help!Psst – we’ve got 25% off for users switching to Qodana! What is Qodana On-Prem Lite? It’s Qodana’s new self-hosted, on-premise solution for static code analysis, empowering your team to maintain high code quality while retaining full control over your data. This version is specifically tailored for organizations that need: Data privacySimplified setupCustomizationKeep your code and analysis within your infrastructure, ensuring compliance and security.Get up and running quickly with a lightweight footprint that minimizes infrastructure requirements.Tailor the analysis to your specific coding standards and project needs. Using the Qodana Installer CLI The Qodana Installer CLI is a command-line utility that simplifies the installation and management of Qodana On-Prem Lite. It’s designed to get you up and running with minimal effort. Here’s how the Installer can help: Install On-Prem Lite: Deploy the application with a single command. Uninstall: Easily remove the application when needed. Back up and restore: Protect your data with backup and restore capabilities. Get admin credentials: Retrieve administrator credentials easily. Why opt for this self-hosted on-prem version of Qodana? ✅ Manage your spend: Lower resource requirements translate to reduced infrastructure costs. ✅ Deploy quickly: Get started faster, accelerating your time to value. ✅ Data control: Maintain control over your data and security. Who is it for? Qodana On-Prem Lite is perfect for enterprise teams needing self-hosted solutions that prioritize data privacy and compliance (think healthcare, government, finance, and more) as well as organizations with smaller teams, as it can help you optimize resource utilization without compromising quality. It’s also a good fit for teams looking for a quick and easy way to deploy and maintain code quality tools. Getting started: the requirements Before you start, make sure you meet the following criteria: Hardware and software: CPU architecture: x86\_64 or ARM64 Cores: \>= 4 Memory: \>= 16 GB Disk: \>= 100 GB Operating system: Any Linux distribution supporting your CPU architecture Docker: \>= 20.10.23 Technical: Domain name system (DNS): Assign a top-level domain (e.g. `qodana.local`) to your Qodana Self-Hosted instance. Docker registry access: Ensure your server can access the `quay.io` Docker registry. Network: Check network requirements documented to ensure the new version notification service, usage statistics, and proxy services are all properly configured. After making sure you meet the requirements, our team can provide you with installation instructions. We’re here to help! For any questions or support, please visit Qodana on YouTrack or email us at qodana-support@jetbrains.com. You’ll find resources and instructions on how to report any issues or provide feedback. Alternatively, view the documentation at the link below. Start improving your code quality today. Pull the Qodana Installer CLI and experience the power and ease of static code analysis with JetBrains Qodana On-Prem Lite. The installation will also work in an airgapped environment. html:
The code quality platform for teams

Get Your Code in Check With Qodana On-Prem Lite, Our Newest, Easy-to-Deploy Solution

You’ve probably heard of Qodana Self-Hosted, but now we’re bringing you a different kind of Self-Hosted Qodana that’s on-premises, Qodana On-Prem Lite, making powerful code quality analysis more accessible than ever.

Designed for teams seeking a streamlined, resource-efficient solution, this new offering brings the benefits of Qodana to a more on-premises environment with a focus on ease of use and rapid deployment. And we’ve also made it simple to install with our new Qodana Installer CLI.

Table of Contents

  • What is Qodana On-Prem Lite?
  • Using the Qodana Installer CLI
  • Why opt for this self-hosted on-prem version of Qodana?
    • Who is it for?
  • Getting started: the requirements
    • We’re here to help!
  • Psst – we’ve got 25% off for users switching to Qodana!

What is Qodana On-Prem Lite?

It’s Qodana’s new self-hosted, on-premise solution for static code analysis, empowering your team to maintain high code quality while retaining full control over your data. This version is specifically tailored for organizations that need:

Using the Qodana Installer CLI

The Qodana Installer CLI is a command-line utility that simplifies the installation and management of Qodana On-Prem Lite. It’s designed to get you up and running with minimal effort.

Here’s how the Installer can help:

  • Install On-Prem Lite: Deploy the application with a single command.
  • Uninstall: Easily remove the application when needed.
  • Back up and restore: Protect your data with backup and restore capabilities.
  • Get admin credentials: Retrieve administrator credentials easily.

Why opt for this self-hosted on-prem version of Qodana?

✅ Manage your spend: Lower resource requirements translate to reduced infrastructure costs.

✅ Deploy quickly: Get started faster, accelerating your time to value.

✅ Data control: Maintain control over your data and security.

Who is it for?

Qodana On-Prem Lite is perfect for enterprise teams needing self-hosted solutions that prioritize data privacy and compliance (think healthcare, government, finance, and more) as well as organizations with smaller teams, as it can help you optimize resource utilization without compromising quality. It’s also a good fit for teams looking for a quick and easy way to deploy and maintain code quality tools.

Getting started: the requirements

Before you start, make sure you meet the following criteria:

Hardware and software:

CPU architecture: x86\_64 or ARM64

Cores: \>= 4

Memory: \>= 16 GB

Disk: \>= 100 GB

Operating system: Any Linux distribution supporting your CPU architecture

Docker: \>= 20.10.23

Technical:

Domain name system (DNS): Assign a top-level domain (e.g. `qodana.local`) to your Qodana Self-Hosted instance.

Docker registry access: Ensure your server can access the `quay.io` Docker registry.

Network:

Check network requirements documented to ensure the new version notification service, usage statistics, and proxy services are all properly configured.

After making sure you meet the requirements, our team can provide you with installation instructions.

We’re here to help!

For any questions or support, please visit Qodana on YouTrack or email us at qodana-support@jetbrains.com. You’ll find resources and instructions on how to report any issues or provide feedback. Alternatively, view the documentation at the link below.

Start improving your code quality today. Pull the Qodana Installer CLI and experience the power and ease of static code analysis with JetBrains Qodana On-Prem Lite. The installation will also work in an airgapped environment.

Find Out More

Psst – we’ve got 25% off for users switching to Qodana!

Did you know you get 25% off when you switch from a comparable solution to Qodana? It’s already a cost-effective solution, but switching means you’ll pay even less. Get in touch to claim your credit.
